comment.author: 23643408@N08
comment._content:
Please, if it is possible, place the description of the images in english. That could make possible that people from all over the world to understand the interesting stories behind those beautiful photographies. 

Thank you.

comment.author: 8252313@N05
comment._content: The Nationaal Archief and Spaarnestad Photo have millions of photographs, often with partial or suboptimal descriptions. By placing them on Flickr, people can add comments to improve the descriptions. To translate the original descriptions would take a lot of effort, and would have to be redone after the comments have been used to improve the descriptions. Also, the Flickr community has been very helpful in providing translations.

The pictures are nice and they have a story to tell so writing some of  the description in english will help very much.
good work, very touching
